main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted near Vieux Boucau, France, on 6-7 December 1963.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 10 minutes., The object was described as disc-shaped and emitted a brilliant white light., The object hovered at an altitude of 300-400 meters before accelerating rapidly., No sound was reported during the observation., The case was forwarded to Project Blue Book for further evaluation.
sighted object: disc-shaped object emitting a brilliant white light
